mapper.update: update VersionUsage set ModSn = #{modsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StarCnt = #{starcnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FollowCnt = #{followcnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CallCnt = #{callcnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreditCnt = #{creditcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where UsgSn = #{usgsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select UsgSn, ModSn, StarCnt, FollowCnt, CallCnt, CreditCnt from VersionUsage
